Description: Heroes come and go, cast up by turbulent times and washed away by the next tide. The Drownie Chorus in Scrimshaw's amphitheatre will pay you handsomely to uncover these patterns from the tales in the Ivory Archives.
LevelDescriptionText: 10|Search the Ivory Archives for historical patterns~20|Share the patterns of history you've found with the Drownie Chorus in Scrimshander's amphitheatre
ChangeDescriptionText: 10|You seek ancient knowledge in the Ivory Archives~20|The Drownie Chorus will pay handsomely for what you've uncovered
Name: Scrimshander: Ivory Archives: Context of Change
